name: Ni Sales Commission For WooCommerce
author: anzia

sections.description:
Sales Commission plug-in provides the option to give the sales commission to your sale agent or dealer based on the order total. Sales Commission plug-in provides the option to set commission based on the user role.  

Order report shows the commission on each order, order commission report gives the details of commission like commission mode, commission amount, order commission and order details.

Commission reports show total commission earned by each user, you can filter the report by order periods.

Key Feature of Ni WooCommerce Sales Commission

  • Provide the option to set the commission base on the user role
  • Set the commission in fixed and percentage mode
  • Order report
  • Commission report
  • Option to set user Commission base on user role
  • Filter report by order period
  • Ajax Search

How Ni Sales Commission For WooCommerce works

  • Install and activate the plugin
  • In menu click on “user role”
  • Set the commission mode (Fixed or Percentage) and commission to user role
  • Click on save button
  • make order
  • In menu click on “commision report” for commision
  • In menu click on “order report” for order

for more features buy our pro version

  • View Demo Ni WooCommerce Sales Agent and Sales Commission
  • Buy Now Ni WooCommerce Sales Agent and Sales Commission

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate “Ni Sales Commission For WooCommerce” plugin from admin panel.
  3. Find “Sales Commission” menu in admin.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email :support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
